svg.text: Features: Visual circle animation, breathing sounds, cycle counter
Duration: 2-10 minutes • Always available • No API required
Features: Emotion-matched songs, YouTube integration, curated playlists
Database: 40+ healing songs • 10 emotion categories • External streaming
Features: Live video, emotion-aware AI, personalized greetings
Requires: Tavius API • Embedded or external viewing • Session management
